column1: Uchi////Solid food and service every time I come whether it be for dinner or for happy hour. My favs are the foie nigiri
column2: gyutoro and hirame usuzukuri. The foie gras is uber rich
column4: and the founder sashimi has a great balance of taste and texture. The ham and eggs roll and bacon tataki are good pork belly options. Can't go wrong with the walu walu
column6: hama chili and fried milk dessert. Skip the zero sen roll and lemon gelato. The gelato comes with a white beet pur√©e that overpowers the whole dish. More savory than sweet.
